title: Mysterious World: The Short Story of a Boy on Another Planet
description: A juvenile named Jake awakens in a spaceship and has no memories of his previous life. He crash lands on a mysterious planet filled with alien beings and the home of an intergalactic superpower. As Jack tries to avoid getting captured and used for nefarious purposes, he tries to find answers to his deepest questions. Do I have alleys? Why do they want me? Who is that girl on my necklace?
author: Casey Smith
